definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.chinese: 这也就是称为场至发射显微镜的技术。

sentences.english: Nature composes some of her loveliest poems for the microscope and telescope.
sentences.chinese: 自然为显微镜和望远镜创作了一些她最优美的诗。

sentences.english: STM is a low coast A. S. K. SAW transmitter module.
sentences.chinese: 扫描隧道显微镜是一种低海岸调幅声发射模块。

sentences.english: Morphology of HSV-1 was identified by inverted microscope.
sentences.chinese: 利用倒置显微镜对病毒感染进行形态学鉴定。

sentences.english: Seen under a microscope , a fresh snowflake has a delicate six-pointed shape.
sentences.chinese: 在显微镜下观察，刚飘下的雪花呈精巧的六角形。

sentences.english: Through microscopic observations researchers identified up to 61 morphospecies.
sentences.chinese: 研究者通过显微镜的观察鉴定了总共61个变种。

sentences.english: First, learn how to focus the microscope.
sentences.chinese: 首先，学习显微镜如何调焦。

sentences.english: The outburst of emulsions was observed by photics microscope.
sentences.chinese: 乳剂的破裂是用光学显微镜下观察。

sentences.english: In itsearly years, it manufactured microscopes almost exclusively.
sentences.chinese: 早年这里差不多只生产显微镜。

sentences.english: The anatomic characteristics of the anterior communicating arterial fenestration were observed under the operating microscope.
sentences.chinese: 在手术显微镜下，观察前交通动脉成窗的解剖学特征。

sentences.english: In this system, the image of the holes on the spinneret were zoomed in and stored for post-processing.
sentences.chinese: 该系统通过显微镜对喷丝孔进行放大成像并采集保存。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the development of the embryo, endosperm, seed coat and pericarp of Humulus scandens(Lour. )Merr. with the light microscope.
sentences.chinese: 本文应用光学显微镜对葎草的胚后发育进行了研究。

sentences.english: The microphotographs of SEM indicated the change of microcosmic morphology.
sentences.chinese: 扫描电子显微镜分析了表微观形貌的变化。

sentences.english: Analysis of KBA microscope imaging quality.
Scanning electron microscope image of the compound eye of a noctuid moth.
sentences.chinese: 扫描电子显微镜图像的复眼的夜蛾蛾。

sentences.english: The nucleolus is the most obvious structure seen in the nucleus of a eucaryotic cell when viewed in the light microscope.
sentences.chinese: 核仁是在光学显微镜下看到细胞核中最明显结构。
